get_started_title: Start your journey with Apni Cabi as
get_started_des: We successfully cope with tasks of varying complexity, provide long-term guarantees and regularly master new technologies.

user_cancelled.title: Booking Cancelled
user_cancelled.description: We're sorry, but your ride has been canceled by the
user_cancelled.subText: We understand that unexpected situations may arise, and we appreciate your understanding. Your availability is now back to active, and you are ready to receive new ride requests.

driver_cancelled.title: Booking Cancelled
driver_cancelled.description: We're sorry, but your ride has been canceled by the driver.
driver_cancelled.subText: We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Thank you for using Apnicabi. We appreciate your understanding.

completed.title: Trip Completed
completed.driver_description: Thank you for completing the ride with Apnicabi. We appreciate your dedication to providing a safe and reliable transportation experience for our passengers.
completed.user_description: Thank you for riding with Apnicabi! Your trip has been successfully completed  and look forward to serving you again soon.

error_message_des: Oops! An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
cancel_request: 'Cancel!', `Would you like to cancel it? If you click 'Yes', your request will be cancelled.`
driver_not_found: Drivers not found at the moment. Please try later!
generic_message_info_1: You cannot receive any ride requests until
generic_message_info_2: Please update below info as soon as possible.
driver_expiry_fields_msg: Below are the documents that will expire within a week:
socket_connection_msg: If still not connected please press online/offline button
search_ride_msg: Looking for ride requests! Please be in online status.
